languages.text: Поврежденные {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щиты{/g} корабля не восстанавливаются в начале следующего хода. Восстанавливайте их с помощью действия Перезагрузки щитов на панели корабля внизу экрана.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
languages.original_text: Поврежденные {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щиты{/g} корабля не восстанавливаются в начале следующего хода. Восстанавливайте их с помощью действия Перезагрузки щитов на панели корабля внизу экрана.

traits.locale_text: The flagship's damaged shields do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
The flagship's damaged shields do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
The flagship's damaged shields do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dañados{/g} de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} no se recuperan al principio de cada turno. En vez de eso, puedes recuperarlos con la acción reiniciar escudos en el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

traits.locale_text: Los escudos dañados de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} no se recuperan al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. En vez de eso, puedes recuperarlos con la acción reiniciar escudos en el panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}損傷{/g}した{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}が、次のターンの開始時に回復することはない。その代わり、画面下部のパネルにあるシールドの再起動操作で復活させることができる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の損傷したシールドが、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に回復することはない。その代わり、画面下部のパネルにあるシールドの再スタート操作で復活させることができる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}受损的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}不会在下个回合开始时自动恢复。您只能通过屏幕下方面板的重启护盾功能来重新启动护盾。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}受损的护盾不会在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时自动恢复。您只能通过屏幕下方面板的重启护盾功能来重新启动护盾。

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}beschädigten{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} erholen sich nicht zu Beginn des nächsten Zuges. Stattdessen können sie mit der Aktion Schilde wieder hochfahren auf dem Panel am unteren Rand des Bildschirms wiederhergestellt werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

traits.locale_text: Die beschädigten Schilde des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} erholen sich nicht zu Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}. Stattdessen können sie mit der Aktion Schilde wieder hochfahren auf dem Panel am unteren Rand des Bildschirms wiederhergestellt werden.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagés{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} ne se rétablissent pas au début du tour suivant. Ils peuvent être rétablis à l'aide de l'action Redémarrer les boucliers du panneau en bas de l'écran.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.

traits.locale_text: Les boucliers endommagés du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} ne se rétablissent pas au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Ils peuvent être rétablis à l'aide de l'action Redémarrer les Boucliers du panneau situé en bas de l'écran.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarlı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanları{/g} bir sonraki turun başında tazelenmez. Bunun yerine, ekranın altındaki panelde bulunan kalkanları tekrar başlat eylemi kullanılarak yenilenebilirler.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} do not recover at the start of the next turn. Instead, they can be restored using the restart shields action on the panel at the bottom of the screen.
